title: Koi No Zetsubou Koushinkyoku
alternative_title: Koi no Zetsubou Koushinkyoku ; 恋の絶望行進曲 ; The Desperate March of Love ; Love's Despair March
status: Koi no Zetsubou Koushinkyoku ; 恋の絶望行進曲 ; The Desperate March of Love ; Love's Despair March
description:
Description :
        A girls' love story about a flirtatious and a serious girl!"Hey, do you want to go out with me?"Rei has been in love with Ami, a girl in her class.She confesses her feelings to Ami, expecting to be rejected, but to her surprise, Ami feels the same way!They become lovers, but there is something a little strange about Ami.She thinks about Ami all the time and loves her wholeheartedly, whereas Rei loves her,Ami, on the other hand, has a more liberal view of love and does not choose just one lover.Will Rei love for her win out, or will the unfaithful Ami get away with it?This is a girls' love story that depicts the anguish of becoming lovers!
